title: IB 290
names: Introduction to Undergraduate Research in Integrative Biology
intro: An introduction to the practice of scientific research through hands-on experience and direct faculty interaction. Through weekly discussions, students are exposed to a variety of research topics, methods and careers in Integrative Biology and practice the steps involved in devising, planning, executing and presenting a scientific research project. Students are also assigned to a faculty advisor and work three hours a week on a laboratory and/or field research project.
